summary.para: Obtains the application character position and length of the range object.

param.name: pacpAnchor
param.para: Pointer to a LONG value that receives the application character position of the range start anchor.

param.name: pcch
param.para: Pointer to a LONG value that receives the number of characters in the range.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: One or more parameters are invalid.

remarks.para: This method should only be called by the owner of the ACP-based context because the character position and range length will only have meaning to a caller that recognizes the text store implementation.

summary.para: Sets the application character position and length of the range object.

param.name: acpAnchor
param.para: Contains the application character position of the range start anchor.

param.name: cch
param.para: Contains the number of characters in the range.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: One or more parameters are invalid.

remarks.para: This method should only be called by the owner of the ACP-based context because the character position and range length will only have meaning to a caller that recognizes the text store implementation.

summary.para: The ITfRangeACP interface is implemented by the TSF manager and is used by an application character position (ACP)-based application to access and manipulate range objects. This interface is derived from the interface. Obtain an instance of this interface by querying an ITfRange object for IID_ITfRangeACP.
